thread.title: Actress Blanca Blanco suffers major wardrobe malfunction as she flashes EVERYTHING on Oscars red carpet
thread.title_full: Actress Blanca Blanco suffers major wardrobe malfunction as she flashes EVERYTHING on Oscars red carpet

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Actress Blanca Blanco suffers major wardrobe malfunction as she flashes EVERYTHING on Oscars red carpet
text:
Actress Blanca Blanco suffers major wardrobe malfunction as she flashes EVERYTHING on Oscars red carpet The underwear-free star's dress featured a dangerously high thigh split Share Oops! Blanca flashed a lot more than bargained for (Photo: REX/Getty) Share   Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Actress Blanca Blanco dared to bare at the 89th annual Academy Awards on Sunday. 
In a sea of flowing Cinderella-style ballgowns, Bianca opted to go underwear free on the red carpet. 
And the star suffered an almighty wardrobe malfunction in her extreme thigh split dress. 
As she posed for pictures, the yellow and gold embellished frock fell open, revealing a lot more than she probably bargained for. 
Fortunately, brunette Blanca didn't seem fazed by the serious fashion faux pas and continued to smile for camera. Bianca Blanco (Photo: PA) Bianca Blanco (Photo: Rex Features) Blanca Blanco (Photo: WireImage) 
Elsewhere on the carpet, Ruth Negga, who is nominated for her role in Loving, in which she plays the real-life Mildred Loving, who was jailed for entering a mixed-race marriage with husband Richard in 1950s Virginia, opted for a bold red lace gown. 
The 35-year-old actress honoured the American Civil Liberties Union (ACLU) with a small blue ribbon pinned to her dress. Bianca Blanco (Photo: Barcroft Media) Bianca Blanco (Photo: Barcroft Media) 
Actress and singer Hailee Steinfeld pulled out all the stops in a gorgeous white gown that was adorned with light pink flowers. 
While Olivia Culpo unveiled a one-of-a-kind Marchesa for Stella Artois gown featuring beads made from the Stella Artois Limited-Edition Chalices that benefit Water.org.
